member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore
member.summary: Core utility class for accessing V Rising game systems and components. Provides centralized access to EntityManager, Server, and other game systems. Updated to match working ICB.core pattern for proper V Rising 1.1+ compatibility.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize VRisingCore with proper world detection

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.ServerWorld
member.summary: Gets the V Rising Server World using the working ICB.core pattern

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.EntityManager
member.summary: Gets the EntityManager for the current world using working pattern.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.ServerGameManager
member.summary: Gets the ServerGameManager for spawning items and managing game state.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Server
member.summary: Gets the main Server system.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Log
member.summary: Gets the current log source for logging messages.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.InitializeServerGameManager
member.summary: Initialize the ServerGameManager from the server systems.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Reinitialize
member.summary: Force reinitialize all systems (useful after world changes).

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.IsReady
member.summary: Check if all required systems are available.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.ValidateEntity(Unity.Entities.Entity,Unity.Entities.ComponentType[])
member.summary: Validate that an entity exists and has the required components.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore
member.summary: Core initialization and service management for CrowbaneArena. Provides centralized access to all arena services and VRising systems.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.World
member.summary: Gets the main VRising world (equivalent to Core.Server in original VAMP).

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.EntityManager
member.summary: EntityManager for the current VRising world.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.SystemService
member.summary: System service providing access to ECS systems.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.PlayerServiceInitialized
member.summary: Player service for player management and lookups (static class - no initialization needed).

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.SpawnServiceInitialized
member.summary: Spawn service for PvP player positioning (static class).

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.HasInitialized
member.summary: Indicates whether the core services have been initialized.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes all CrowbaneArena core services. Call this after VRising has loaded all its systems.

member.name: E:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.OnCoreLoaded
member.summary: Event triggered after core initialization completes. Subscribe to this to perform custom setup after services are available.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.GetStatus
member.summary: Gets information about the current initialization state.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.CrowbaneArenaCore.Reinitialize
member.summary: Force reinitialize all services (useful for testing or world changes).

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.AbilityManager.ReplaceAbility(Unity.Entities.Entity,System.Int32,Stunlock.Core.PrefabGUID)
member.summary: Replaces an ability in the specified slot for the given player
member.param: The player entity
The ability slot to replace
The new ability prefab GUID

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.AbilityManager.ActivateVBloodAbility(Unity.Entities.Entity,Stunlock.Core.PrefabGUID)
member.summary: Activates a V Blood ability for the specified player.
member.param: The player entity.
The ability prefab to activate.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts
member.summary: Complete loadout configurations for CrowbaneArena. These provide balanced sets of weapons, armor, and consumables for PvP matches.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Warrior
member.summary: Loadout 1: Warrior Build - Balanced tank/attacker with Chaos enhancements Weapon: Storm-enchanted Greatsword for strong melee damage Armor: Full Dracula Warrior set for survivability Consumables: Mix of healing and empowerment potions

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Assassin
member.summary: Loadout 2: Assassin Build - High mobility and glass cannon damage Weapon: Illusion-enchanted Daggers for stealth and speed Armor: Dracula Rogue set for mobility and utilities Consumables: Speed and damage-focused potions

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Mage
member.summary: Loadout 3: Mage Build - High magical damage with area control Weapon: Frost-enchanted Spear for spell power and utility Armor: Dracula Scholar set for magical enhancements Consumables: Mana and resistance potions

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Brute
member.summary: Loadout 4: Brute Build - Pure tank with devastating close-range attacks Weapon: Unholy-enchanted Mace for movement speed and survivability Armor: Dracula Brute set for maximum defense Consumables: Survivability and burst damage potions

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.All
member.summary: Gets all loadouts as a list.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.GetByNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a loadout by build number (1-4).
member.param: Build number (1=Warrior, 2=Assassin, 3=Mage, 4=Brute).
member.returns: The corresponding loadout config, or null if invalid number.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.LoadoutConfig
member.summary: Loadout configuration class for PvP setups.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.GodModeSystem
member.summary: God-Mode system for arena progression. Unlocks all V Blood on entry, restores on exit. Manages complete item lifecycle: clear on entry, restore on exit.

member.summary: Fills player blood to maximum quality (100.0f)

member.summary: Clear arena items and destroy equipment (do not restore original equipment)

member.summary: Enters arena mode: captures progression, clears items, provides default loadout, unlocks all VBlood.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.GodModeSystem.ExitArena(System.Object)
member.summary: Exits arena mode: restores progression, clears arena items, restores original items.

member.summary: Player has been kicked once and now needs to be spawned in the arena on next join.

member.summary: Player is currently active in the arena with reset progress.

member.summary: Player has exited the arena and needs to be kicked to restore their original progress.

member.summary: Restores a player's original progress by re-binding their archived character name.
member.returns: True if progress was successfully restored.

member.summary: Spawn a weapon variant for a player based on weapon name and mod combo
member.param: Player entity
Base weapon name (e.g., "sword", "axe")
Mod combo string (e.g., "s123" for Storm + Movement/Attack/Spell)
Number of weapons to spawn (default: 1)
member.returns: True if weapon was spawned successfully

member.summary: Simple format: { "Name": GUID }

member.summary: Array format: [{ "Name": "", "Guid": 0, "Category": "" }, ...]

member.summary: Category-based format: { "category": { "name": guid, ... }, ... }

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Utilities.PrefabConverter.Commands.AddItem(System.String)
member.summary: Single-word command to add any item: .add weapon/sword/1234567890 Format: .add [category]/[name]/[guid]

member.summary: Import items from a JSON string: .import json:{...} Supports multiple formats automatically detected

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Utils.TypeConversion
member.summary: Provides utility methods for type conversion between different vector types and entity operations.

member.summary: Converts a UnityEngine.Vector3 to Unity.Mathematics.float3.
member.param: The source Vector3 to convert
member.returns: A new float3 with the same component values

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Utils.TypeConversion.ToFloat3(UnityEngine.Vector2,System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a UnityEngine.Vector2 to Unity.Mathematics.float3 with an optional Y component.
member.param: The source Vector2 to convert (XZ plane)
The Y component value (default: 0)
member.returns: A new float3 with X and Z from vec, and the specified Y value

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Utils.TypeConversion.ToFloat3(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Gets the position of a Transform as a float3.
member.param: The Transform to get position from
member.returns: The position as float3, or float3.zero if transform is null

member.summary: Gets the user entity associated with a character entity.
member.param: The EntityManager to use for the query
The character entity to look up
member.returns: The associated user entity, or Entity.Null if not found

member.summary: Gets the platform ID (Steam ID) for a user entity.
member.param: The EntityManager to use for the query
The user entity to look up
member.returns: The platform ID, or 0 if not found
